name: Diluc
title: The Dark Side of Dawn
intro: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

normalAttack.title: Tempered Sword
normalAttack.info:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack

Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skill.title: Searing Onslaught
skill.info:
Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.

This skill can be used 3 times consecutively. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.

burst.title: Dawn
burst.info:
Releases intense flames to knock nearby opponents back, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG.
The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro.

passiveTalents.title: Relentless
passiveTalents.info: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passiveTalents.title: Blessing of Phoenix
passiveTalents.info: The Pyro Enchantment provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally. Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.

passiveTalents.title: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passiveTalents.info: Refunds 15% of the ores used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.
